hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select count(*) from R_2001_10_2001 a inner join R_2001_10_2003 b on a.C1=b.C6 where a.C8=:empcid and b.C7=:time
select #ColName,b.C1 from R_2001_10_2001 a inner join R_2001_10_2003 b on a.C1=b.C6 where b.C8='0' and a.C6 like '#empKind%'
select Count(*) from R_2001_10_2001 a inner join R_2001_10_2003 b on a.C1=b.C6 where b.C8='0'and a.C6 like '#empKind%'
update R_2001_10_2003 set C8='1' where C1=:guid
update R_2001_10_2003 set C8='1' from R_2001_10_2001 b where R_2001_10_2003.C6=b.C1 and b.c6 like '#empKind%'
select C7,#StatColumn from R_2001_10_2003 where c8=0 group by c7
select top 1 #ColName from #tableName where C6='#guid' order by c7 desc
select #ColName from #tableName where c6='#guid' order by c7 desc
select * from ( select #ColName from R_2001_10_2003 where C6='#guid' and C8='1' union all select #ColName from R_2001_10_2004 where C6='#guid') as T where c7 !='#currYear' order by T.c7 desc
select #ColName from #tableName where C6='#guid' #TimeWhere order by c7 desc
